message.content:
cs.IT, cs.MM, cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of source coding, which is a fundamental problem in information theory and falls under the category of information theory (cs.IT). The use of quadratic Gaussian sources and the focus on sum-rate tightness suggest that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-category of multimedia (cs.MM) and signal processing (cs.SI). The paper also involves optimization and the use of convex optimization techniques, which may make it relevant to the sub-category of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS) and machine learning (cs.LG).
